posts.title: welcome to the new blog
posts.body: Ninja Ipsum is a sexy 'Lorem Ipsum' meant exclusively for Ninjas.In publishing and graphic design, lorem ipsum is a filler text / dummy text commonly used to demonstrate the graphic elements of a document or visual presentation. Replacing meaningful content that could be distracting with placeholder text may allow viewers to focus on graphic aspects such as font, typography, and page layout.
